RPLIDAR A1M8 Laser Range Scanner

Datasheet:
RPLIDAR A1 Low Cost 360 Degree Laser Range Scanner Introduction and Datasheet (Model A1M8)

Features:
0.15m to 12m Distance Range
360° Angular Range
8000Hz Sample Frequency

Connection:
UART to USB Type-A Adapter

Interfacing:
Slametec RPLIDAR Public SDK for C++

Dimensions:
96.8mm x 70.3mm x 70mm

Use-Case:
Detects obstacles and collects data for mapping RoboFlock’s environment in Nav2.
